sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react";
import "./App.css";
import { Button, Checkbox, Form, Dimmer, Grid } from "semantic-ui-react";

const options = {
  result: [
    { text: "", value: "" },
    { text: "Won", value: "won" },
    { text: "Loss", value: "loss" },
    { text: "Draw", value: "draw" },
    { text: "Leave/Disconnect", value: "leave" }
  ],
  heros: [
    { text: "Tank", value: "" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "D.Va", value: "dva" },
    { text: "Orisa", value: "orisa" },
    { text: "Reinhardt", value: "reinhardt" },
    { text: "Roadhog", value: "roadhog" },
    { text: "Winston", value: "winston" },
    { text: "Wrecking Ball", value: "wrecking_ball" },
    { text: "Zarya", value: "zarya" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Damage", value: "" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Ashe", value: "ashe" },
    { text: "Bastion", value: "bastion" },
    { text: "Doomfist", value: "doomfist" },
    { text: "Genji", value: "genji" },
    { text: "Hanzo", value: "hanzo" },
    { text: "Junkrat", value: "junkrat" },
    { text: "McCree", value: "mccree" },
    { text: "Mei", value: "mei" },
    { text: "Pharah", value: "pharah" },
    { text: "Reaper", value: "reaper" },
    { text: "Soldier: 76", value: "soldier_76" },
    { text: "Sombra", value: "sombra" },
    { text: "Symmetra", value: "symmetra" },
    { text: "Torbjörn", value: "torbjorn" },
    { text: "Tracer", value: "tracer" },
    { text: "Widowmaker", value: "widowmaker" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Support", value: "" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Ana", value: "ana" },
    { text: "Baptiste", value: "baptiste" },
    { text: "Brigitte", value: "brigitte" },
    { text: "Lúcio", value: "lucio" },
    { text: "Mercy", value: "mercy" },
    { text: "Moira", value: "moira" },
    { text: "Zenyatta", value: "zenyatta" }
  ],
  party: [
    { text: 1, value: 1 },
    { text: 2, value: 2 },
    { text: 3, value: 3 },
    { text: 4, value: 4 },
    { text: 5, value: 5 },
    { text: 6, value: 6 }
  ],
  map: [
    { text: "Assault Maps", value: "" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Hanamura", value: "hanamura" },
    { text: "Horizon Lunar Colony", value: "horizon" },
    { text: "Paris", value: "paris" },
    { text: "Temple of Anubis", value: "temple_of_anubis" },
    { text: "Volskaya Industries", value: "volskaya" },
    { text: "Hybrid Maps", value: "" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Blizzard World", value: "blizzard_world" },
    { text: "Eichenwalde", value: "eichenwalde" },
    { text: "Hollywood", value: "hollywood" },
    { text: "King's Row", value: "king's_row" },
    { text: "Numbani", value: "numbani" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Escort Maps", value: "" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Dorado", value: "dorado" },
    { text: "Junkertown", value: "junkertown" },
    { text: "Rialto", value: "rialto" },
    { text: "Route 66", value: "route_66" },
    { text: "Watchpoint: Gibraltar", value: "gibraltar" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Control Maps", value: "" },
    {
      text:
        "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________",
      value: ""
    },
    { text: "Busan", value: "busan" },
    { text: "Ilios", value: "ilios" },
    { text: "Lijiang Tower", value: "lijiang Tower" },
    { text: "Nepal", value: "nepal" },
    { text: "Oasis", value: "oasis" }
  ]
};

class Record extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <Grid.Column className="center">
        <Form>
          <Form.Select
            fluid
            label="Result"
            options={options.result}
            placeholder=""
          />
          <Form.Input
            fluid
            type="number"
            label="Current Ranking"
            placeholder="Current Ranking"
          />
          <Form.Select
            fluid
            label="Hero"
            options={options.heros}
            placeholder=""
          />
          <Form.Select
            fluid
            label="Secondary Hero"
            options={options.heros}
            placeholder=""
          />
          <Form.Select
            fluid
            label="Party Size"
            options={options.party}
            placeholder=""
          />
          <Form.Select
            fluid
            label="Map"
            options={options.maps}
            placeholder=""
          />
          <Button type="submit">Submit</Button>
        </Form>
      </Grid.Column>
    );
  }
}

export default Record;
